short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI powered flashcard generator for Anki, aimed for the quick tranformation of online resources into Anki flashcards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your reading and learning experience with FMA, a free browser extension that brings Perplexity, Claude & ChatGPT to every website you visit. Just select some text and get quick answers to any questions you have. 

🪄1️⃣ Learn Without Interruptions

Tired of constant distractions while reading? Use FMA to get immediate answers to your questions, bridging the gap between reading and searching.

🪄2️⃣ Get Answers on the Spot

No time to read the whole article? Ask FMA, and it will provide you with Q&As capturing all the key points.

Encounter an unfamiliar term? Simply highlight the text, and let FMA do the heavy lifting.

Learning a new language? Rely on FMA for seamless translations, complete with sentence examples to boost your vocabulary.

🪄3️⃣ Use Prompts for Your Unique Needs

FMA lets you use specialized prompts to suit your unique needs. Cloze deletion, True of False questions, Multiple Choice questions. The answers are now at your fingertips.

🪄4️⃣ Generate Anki Flashcards on the Fly

Are you an Anki user? FMA has something special for you. You can instantly create AI-generated flashcards based on selected text and save them directly in Anki. No more tedious copy-pasting! 

🪄5️⃣ Track Your Flashcards, Avoid Duplication

With FMA, you can easily see the flashcards you've already generated, both on the websites where they were created and within Anki itself. This way, you won't waste time on duplicate work—keeping your learning efficient and organized.

⬇️ Download FMA now and transform your browsing experience!

🚀 Quick Start Tips

Click the Add to Chrome button located in the upper right corner.

Click the puzzle piece 🧩 icon in Chrome’s toolbar, look for FMA, and pin it  📌

Select any text on a website

Select a command from the tooltip

Let the magic happen 🪄

🟩🟩 Detailed Introduction to FMA 🟩🟩

💻 Feature Highlights:

💡 Select some text and choose a command from the tooltip menu. No more copy&pasting

💡 Assign a keyboard shortcut to commands to quickly trigger it

💡 Selectively exclude FMA from any website where you don’t want it

💡 Generate flashcards and send them to your Anki collection effortlessly

💡 You can select a specific deck as the destination for the generated flashcards!

Found a bug? 🪲 Please report it by clicking on the “Report a bug” button in the settings or menu

Any suggestions? Please contact us at 💌 help@sokilearn.com

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:
❔ Is FMA free?
Yes, you can use FMA for free. There is a small credit you get, so you can use FMA for free within a limited credit. All features are available, but the times you can use them are limited for free; this implies a cost that the company absorbs.  You may have a premium subscription or buy credits in order to use chatbots for a lot longer. 

❔ Do I need to create an account?

No, you can use FMA without a Soki account. Albeit possible, we suggest creating a Soki account so you get the advantages such as syncing multiple devices or online backup.

❔ What is the relationship between FMA and ChatGPT, Perplexity or Anthropic?
FMA is a tool developed based on language models and has no relationship with their respective providers.

❔ Do I need an Anki (Ankiweb) account in order to get the flashcards?

You do not need an account, although it is recommended you use an Ankiweb account for syncing your collection to the cloud. You only need to install the Ankiconnect add-on. We have a detailed guide on our webpage, also accessible from FMA.
